lead_paragraph: Frenchman Gilles Simon upstaged world number three Stan Wawrinka 6-4 6-4 in the third round of the Shanghai Masters on Thursday, while top seeds Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray eased into the quarter-finals.
snippet: Frenchman Gilles Simon upstaged world number three Stan Wawrinka 6-4 6-4 in the third round of the Shanghai Masters on Thursday, while top seeds Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray eased into the quarter-finals....

headline.main: Simon Knocks Out Wawrinka in Shanghai, Djokovic, Murray Advance
headline.print_headline: Simon Knocks Out Wawrinka in Shanghai, Djokovic, Murray Advance
